content.question: The rhetorical purpose expressed in the excerpt would most likely have been interpreted as promoting which of the following?

choices.label: Expanding suffrage rights to all White men
Challenging Great Britainâ€™s control of Canada
Using international commerce to expand United States influence
Investing in technology to make ocean voyages faster

content.answer: Using international commerce to expand United States influence

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
